name: Mitigation Playbook for Web Service API Exfiltration Incident
description: This playbook addresses an incident where an attacker exfiltrated sensitive data using a web service API. It includes blocking outbound traffic, scanning for threats, and investigating logs for suspicious activities.

action--5d80a704-29db-49fd-9ded-e0fdd72f.name: Block Outbound Traffic to Suspicious IP
action--5d80a704-29db-49fd-9ded-e0fdd72f.description: Block all outbound traffic to the identified suspicious IP address to prevent further data exfiltration.

while-condition--79b83d70-04e5-4c07-b683.name: Repeat EDR Scan Until Clean
while-condition--79b83d70-04e5-4c07-b683.description: Continue running endpoint detection and response scans until no threats are detected.

parallel--ef3dc45e-ac56-4538-ace4-f1f573.name: Concurrent Mitigations
parallel--ef3dc45e-ac56-4538-ace4-f1f573.description: Run EDR scan and investigate logs simultaneously.

action--abe8cd36-f12f-4a30-b3fb-5c6c2b88.name: Run Endpoint Detection and Response Scan
action--abe8cd36-f12f-4a30-b3fb-5c6c2b88.description: Trigger an endpoint detection and response scan to identify and mitigate threats on the system.

action--e4b08cc1-4f7a-4934-bbfd-30700cfc.name: Investigate Logs for Additional Suspicious Activities
action--e4b08cc1-4f7a-4934-bbfd-30700cfc.description: Check logs to find any further suspicious activities related to the data exfiltration incident.

suspicious_activity.description: Indicator if suspicious activity was detected
